name: Knowledge Summit
paragraphs: Held for 5 years in a row under the patronage of HH Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice President and Prime Minister of the UAE, ruler of Dubai, and the directives of MBRF Chairman HH Sheikh Ahmed bin Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum.

The Knowledge Summit is the largest event of its kind in the Middle East, fully organized end-to-end by entourage. Bringing the world leaders into one place from Gordon Brown, Princess Ghida, Steve Wozniak, National Geography’s CEO Hugh Herr in addition to Jimmy Wales Wikipedia founder, internet founder Tim Berners-Lee, in addition to many other big names from the international and regional sphere.

Entourage was appointed by MBRF in 2014 to come up with an idea for a conference for knowledge. We created the brand, the logo, the content, the agenda, and the topics, appointed speakers from all around the world, designed the creatives, media planning and buying to position the knowledge summit as one of the biggest international knowledge conferences across the globe. We created an award holding the name of Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid to celebrate minds and recognize people who have accomplished something different in the knowledge world and their accomplishments have a had a positive impact on the community.
Needless to say the event was a testimony of entourage’s capabilities as one of the leading conference organizing agencies in the region that impressed more than 12000 guests hosted by the summit.

og.title: Knowledge- summit
og.description: The Knowledge Summit is the largest event of its kind in the Middle East, fully organized end-to-end by entourage
